com.csahmad.moodcloud

Class AccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csahmad.moodcloud.AccountController

  • public class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object
    Get Accounts using elasticsearch or add/update accounts using elasticsearch.
    See Also:
    ElasticSearchController

      • getAccountFromId

        public Account getAccountFromId(java.lang.String id)
                         throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return the Account that has the given ID.

        Return null if no Account has the given ID.

        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the desired Account
        Returns:
        the Account that has the given ID
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • getAccounts

        public java.util.ArrayList<Account> getAccounts(SearchFilter filter,
                                                int from)
                                         throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
        Return Accounts that match the given filter.

        If filter is null or has no restrictions, return all Accounts.

        Parameters:
        filter - restricts which Accounts will be returned (defines conditions each Account must satisfy)
        from - set to 0 to get the first x number of results, set to x to get the next x number of results, set to 2x to get the next x number of results after that, and so on
        Returns:
        Accounts from the elasticsearch index
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException

      • addOrUpdateAccounts

        public void addOrUpdateAccounts(Account... accounts)
        Add or update the given Accounts via elasticsearch.

        If an Account has a null ID, add it. If an Account has a non-null ID, update it.

        Parameters:
        accounts - the Accounts to add or update

        public void deleteAccounts(Account... accounts)

        accounts -
